Articles.Content: On the reaction wheels? Try adding probe cores to slowly increase the torque power.

On the reaction wheels? Try adding probe cores to slowly increase the torque power.

No I mean thrust overall. It's got 4 oktos in there already, and 4 or 5 SAS wheels. Probably needs at least 6 or 8.
I have no idea, it seems similar to the infiniglide glitch I know that more control surfaces make infinigliders faster.

No I mean thrust overall. It's got 4 oktos in there already, and 4 or 5 SAS wheels. Probably needs at least 6 or 8.

Maybe rotationally clipping landing legs? You should check out the K-drive page, we had a lot of research into harnessing the glitch, including the fact that opening the legs in the assembly editor would break the bug.

Maybe rotationally clipping landing legs? You should check out the K-drive page, we had a lot of research into harnessing the glitch, including the fact that opening the legs in the assembly editor would break the bug.

no, my turbine is detached from the ship, it rotates and provides wing lift to thrust. It's more stable than a K-drive.

no, my turbine is detached from the ship, it rotates and provides wing lift to thrust. It's more stable than a K-drive.

The Haters are though, they're hard to even flip. But the Big launcher is easy meat.

Actually the Haters were built to deflect missiles. Their heavily sloped armour is based on the Jagdpanzer 38t "Hetzer".

BATTLE UPDATE!

The MU APT-1 Heron Trident 2 attacks the DCOV Atakabune.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The Atakabune was moderately damaged, but appears to be operational. In response, the Heron MK2 is now under development.

Also, MBT-2 Wolverine 1 managed to right itself and retreat to another part of KSC.

Is that purpose crashing into things?

Nah. It's a unconventional scout fighter SSTO. It flies decently, has dual RAPIERs for VTOL, and is lightly armed.

Though a RAPIER-powered kamikaze drone/cruise missile is a good idea...

That was about a page and a half of arguing I've just excised from this thread.

This is why there is such a hard line against "RP" and chat-type threads. Play nicely people, and don't go posting private comments in public either. Accusing them in public of ripping designs off is also harassment. Deal with it in PM and/or report the offending post. That's what the "report post" button is there for.
I stop paying attention for four days and a moderator has to step in....*hrng*

I just stood back and watched, I wanted no part of it.

Also, I'm going to build a spaceship under 100 tons today so I can participate in low-weight battles.

I'm glad I wasn't here, That would have been a massive argument and I've seen enough of them here.
